backend/main.mo: Motoko backend providing products, customers, bills, expenses, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD with admin/user checks and login helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file across the app.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore file excluding Android build outputs, IDE files, logs, and temp artifacts.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android build configuration defining app metadata, build types, Kotlin/Java settings, dependencies, and PWA URL validation task.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard configuration preserving WebView, Kotlin metadata, and wrapper classes for release builds.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest declaring permissions, app metadata, MainActivity settings, and launcher/deep‑link intent filters.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: Sets up a fullscreen WebView wrapper for the PWA, handles navigation, external links, dark mode, and basic error logging.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Defines the round variant of the adaptive launcher icon.
Defines the adaptive launcher icon using background and foreground resources.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Provides the launcher background color definition.
Contains app strings including the configurable PWA URL and basic error messages.
Defines the main app theme and fullscreen activity theme with dark styling.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting Kotlin and Android plugin versions.
frontend/android/dist/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder to keep the dist directory in version control.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Configures Gradle performance options, AndroidX flags, Kotlin style, and optional PWA URL injection.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Specifies Gradle wrapper distribution settings and version.
frontend/android/README.md: Documentation describing the Android wrapper setup, configuration requirements, build steps, and PWA URL validation.
frontend/android/scripts/build-release-a: Builds a release APK, validates PWA URL, enforces filename patterns, and stages versioned release output.
frontend/android/scripts/publish-release: Publishes the latest built APK and generates versioned publish metadata.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Configures repository management and includes the app module.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint registering the service worker and loading the PWA frontend.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Defines PWA metadata including name, colors, icons, and display properties.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements service worker caching with network-first navigation and cache-first asset strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth state, build version cache resets, startup phases, and routing between screens.
frontend/src/auth/passwordAuth.tsx: Provides a context-based password auth system with login, logout, and persisted session restoration.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the overall app layout including side nav, mobile drawer, top bar, and footer around page content.
Renders detailed startup or auth error UI with retry, cache clear, and session reset options.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDialog.t: Dialog for creating or editing customers with form state, offline queueing, and API mutations.
Mobile navigation drawer listing screens with icons and routing callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProductDialog.ts: Dialog for creating or editing products with validation, unit handling, offline queueing, and mutations.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableC: Provides a responsive list of rendered card components and a helper row component for label-value display.
frontend/src/components/RootErrorBoundar: Implements a global error boundary that displays an error card with reload and retry options.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Renders the sidebar navigation and persists/restores the last selected screen using localStorage.
frontend/src/components/SyncIndicator.ts: Shows online/offline status, pending sync count, and retry options based on sync state.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Displays the top navigation bar with menu control, sync indicator, and user profile/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStatus.ts: Wraps useActor to expose initialization status, errors, diagnostics, and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability state and exposes a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for authentication, user profile operations, and backend or local-storage data actions with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupWatchdog.ts: Implements a watchdog timer that captures diagnostics if app startup takes too long.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and overrides for dialog and sheet components with opaque UI surfaces.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Implements localStorage-based caching and an offline action queue with retry metadata.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineQueue.ts: Hook that executes actions immediately and queues them on failure, exposing processing state and pending count.
frontend/src/offline/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks online status and processes queued offline actions, syncing with the backend when available.
frontend/src/screens/BillingScreen.tsx: UI for creating bills, managing line items, calculating totals, and queuing bill creation offline.
frontend/src/screens/CreditsScreen.tsx: Fetches bills and customers to compute per-customer credit totals and displays them in responsive card and table layouts with loading states.
frontend/src/screens/CustomersScreen.tsx: Lists all customers with admin‑restricted add, edit, and delete actions, using offline queueing and a dialog for modifications.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows high‑level stats for products, customers, bills, and credit totals, plus sync status and recent activity indicators.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles owner/salesman login, profile setup, and authentication state management with detailed status handling and error feedback.
frontend/src/screens/ProductsScreen.tsx: Displays product inventory with admin‑only add, edit, and delete actions, integrating offline queueing and a product dialog.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: React screen for viewing reports, managing expenses, and generating sales/profit summaries with admin-only expense creation and deletion.
frontend/src/types/local.ts: Defines frontend-only types for products, customers, and bills using bigint IDs and pricing fields.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Normalizes backend authorization errors into clear, user-friendly messages by stripping technical details.
frontend/src/utils/billingTotals.ts: Provides functions to calculate billing totals and GST amounts, including legacy bill handling.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Exports a build ID constant used to detect new deployments and trigger cache refreshes.
frontend/src/utils/printInvoice.ts: Generates a printable invoice in a popup window using bill and customer data with formatted totals.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Calculates daily sales, date-range summaries, and profit metrics from bills, products, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/resetCachedApp.ts: Clears storage, caches, and service workers to reset the app before reloading.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across normal and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, known login connection issue, and three existing feature definitions related to improved actor initialization and diagnostics.
